game.name: Arzette: The Jewel of Faramore
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A NEW interactive animated adventure! In this action-adventure game, Arzette must explore the Kingdom of Faramore, slay fearsome foes, acquire powerful items, discover secrets, assist colorful characters, and defeat the evil Daimur!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A NEW interactive animated adventure! In this action-adventure game, Arzette must explore the Kingdom of Faramore, slay fearsome foes, acquire powerful items, discover secrets, assist colorful characters, and defeat the evil Daimur!

reviewHighlights.text: I beat the game in a lil over 3 hours, 100% all items I.... The novelty ran out by the hour mark. The gameplay was okay...? I genuinely felt my brain...
This was so much Fun. They took what was basically a Meme and ran with it, it was not just a love letter to those memes. But they improved on what mad...
